info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 4:22PM EDT until June 02 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Herkimer County in eastern New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mohawk, or over Herkimer, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Jordanville, Elizabethtown, Warren, Cullen, Spinnerville, North Ilion, South Columbia, Fink Basin, South Ilion, Millers Mills Crossing, Columbia Center, Crains Corners, Dennison Corners, Youngs Crossing and McCoon Crossing. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
